To close this today, please choose ONE option (either works):

2) **10–15 minute call immediately:** walk through the same outline live; then paste a short bullet summary here.

Right after you provide (1) or (2), please send **[APPLY]** and we will respond with a definitive **[ACCEPT]/[REJECT]** the same round.
